overview:
Christine Kirk advises luxury travel, restaurant, technology, and lifestyle brands on social media marketing, traditional public relations campaigns, and online branding. She has amassed over 16,000 engaged followers on Twitter (find her @LuxuryPRGal), and growing, and is a guest blogger and speaker on various social media, PR and luxury lifestyle subjects.

Christine has experience in traditional PR campaigns and media relations and has landed influential placements for clients in local and national television, radio and print media; Representative placements include: USA Today, The Wall Street Journal, The Los Angeles Times, The Hollywood Reporter, CNN Headline News, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno, Good Day LA, CBS News, among many others.

Christine specializes in online communications and social media marketing campaigns for food & beverage, restaurant/nightclub, luxury travel, luxury real estate, consumer lifestyle products, consumer electronics, wireless, consumer technology, and automotive clients.

In addition to consulting brands, Christine is a freelance writer for CBSLA.com in Los Angeles covering travel, food/restaurant, and lifestyle beats for the second largest news web site in LA, and is also a freelance writer covering luxury travel for JustLuxe.com.
